root.name: Renaissance Heroes
root.description: OverviewA free to play, arena based first person shooter, made with the Unreal Engine 3.Game ModesThe game features the usual FPS gameplay modes of: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Seize the Scrolls (CTF), Touchdown and Domination. PC System RequirementsOS:Windows XPProcessor:Single Core 3GHzMemory:1 GB RAMGraphics:Geforce 6600GT 128MHard Drive:6 GB HD spaceOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
